# Delete Draft Orders

If you saved an order as a draft during the ordering process and no longer wish to submit the order,  you can delete it.&#x20;

Deleted draft orders cannot be recovered but will still be displayed in your list of orders. When you delete a draft purchase order, the agreement linked to the draft is also deleted.&#x20;

## Deleting a draft order

To delete a draft order:

1. On the **Orders** page (**Marketplace** > **Orders**), click the draft order to delete. You can use [filters ](../../../marketplace-platform/getting-started/marketplace-for-clients/how-to-filter-your-orders.md)to find your draft orders.
2. On the details page of the order, click the down arrow <img src="data:image/png;base64," alt="" data-size="line">in the upper right and select **Delete**.&#x20;

<figure><img src="../../../.gitbook/assets/image (955).png" alt=""><figcaption><p>Delete option in the upper right</p></figcaption></figure>

3. In the **Delete order** confirmation, click **Delete** to confirm the action. The draft order is deleted and the status of the order changes from **Draft** to **Deleted** on the **Orders** page.

<figure><img src="../../../.gitbook/assets/image (956).png" alt="" width="563"><figcaption><p>Delete order confirmation</p></figcaption></figure>
